column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Herbalist says : " Hands off ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Ow ! "
#Text=Herbalist says : " What do you think you 're doing ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Taking the cure to my friends . "
#Text=Herbalist says : " This is n't a cure !
#Text=" Herbalist says : " Well , all they need are some frozen wood frogs .
#Text=There 's plenty down in the valley swamp .
#Text=" Aang says : " What am I supposed to do with frozen frogs ?
#Text=" Herbalist says : " Why , suck on them of course !
#Text=" Aang says : " Suck on them ?
#Text=" Herbalist says : " The frog skin excretes a substance that will cure your friends .
#Text=Be sure to get plenty because once those little critters thaw out , they 're useless !
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're insane , are n't you ?
#Text=" Herbalist says : " That 's right !
#Text=Well , do n't stand there all day !
#Text=Go !
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh ... I think you dropped this ... A frog !
#Text="
